name: Rabbitville
description:
What is Rabbitville?

Rabbitville is an investigate narrative game. Tasked with finding an invisible weapon, your only options are to wander a cursed forest, and speak with the rabbits who live there. Using minimalist pixel graphics, Rabbitville emphasizes mood to create a compelling mystery.

More details?
Rabbitville is a tiny game, and will probably take between 10 and 20 minutes for a complete playthrough. It will be free.

Is Rabbitville just another walking simulator?
No. In addition to walking, Rabbitville also has talking.

Does Rabbitville take itself too seriously?
Absolutely.
